    • Method Detail

      • makeTour

        public static Tour makeTour()
        Returns a Tour which has its index array set to null. This is a factory method for testing purpose.

      • length

        int length()
        Returns length of the array that effectively represents the tour, i.e. the order of cities to visit.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this Tour's distance to that of the other tour.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
        Parameters:
        the - other Tour for comparing

      • sequence

        static Tour sequence()
        Returns a consecutive order Tour.
        Returns:
        a Tour that visits cities in ascending order of the city's index in the array of cities

      • rndTour

        static Tour rndTour()
        Returns a randomized order Tour.
        Returns:
        a Tour that visits cities in a randomly set order

      • randomize

        void randomize()
        Returns a overall randomized order Tour.

      • randomize

        void randomize(int i,
             int j)
        Returns a Tour that is randomized between given indices.
        Parameters:
        i - i the index from the city visiting order is shuffled
        j - j the index until the city visiting order is shuffled

      • rndSwapTwo

        void rndSwapTwo()
        Randomly select two Cities among all Cities and change their order.

      • rndSwapTwo

        void rndSwapTwo(int i,
              int j)
        Within the given range, randomly select two Cities and change their order.
        Parameters:
        i - the index from which the random pick can be made
        j - the index until which the random pick can be made

      • city

        City city(int i)
        Returns City at a given index.
        Parameters:
        i - the index of this City in TSP's City array
        Returns:
        City at the given index

      • distance

        double distance()
        Returns aggregate of all distances from unit tours in this Tour, i.e. tour between two Cities
        Returns:
        the distance of the whole tour

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns string representation of this Tour.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string representation of this Tour

      • mutate

        void mutate()
        Carries out mutation with 10% chance. When mutation happens, two randomly picked Cities exchange their order.

      • crossOver

        Tour crossOver(Tour p2,
             int x1,
             int x2)
        Returns a hybrid Tour made of this Tour and the other designated tour.
        Parameters:
        p2 - the other Tour with which this Tour will carry out crossover
        x1 - first index of the crossover segment
        x2 - last index of the crossover segment
        Returns:
        a hybrid tour with a crossover segment

      • display

        void display(Map m)
        Displays this Tour through Map.
        Parameters:
        m - the map that effectively projects this tour

        Displays this Tour.

        g - graphics
